subject: French Open (Tennis)
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal beat Andy Murray in straight sets, setting up a matchup with Roger Federer, who put an end to Novak Djokovic’s streak of 43 straight victories.
snippet: Rafael Nadal beat Andy Murray in straight sets, setting up a matchup with Roger Federer, who put an end to Novak Djokovic’s streak of 43 straight victories.
